participant_1.background:
I have a lot of fond memories of playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
i prefer winter.
I stopped by my local sushi bar on my way home from work to pick up a delicious meal.
my favourite band is rush.
i spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.

participant_2.background:
I have a good relationship with my parents, although we don't always agree on everything.
My first paycheck bought me a soccer ball and my time is too valuable for Comic Con.
I started a blog where I share my thoughts and feelings on topics I am passionate about.
I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad.
I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics.

content.text: What's your favorite thing about fall?
I love the change in the weather, the leaves turning colors, and the crisp air.
I agree, it's a great time of year! What are some of your favorite fall activities?
I love going for walks in the park, hiking, and camping. I also like to bake and cook with fall flavors, like pumpkin and apple.
Those all sound great! I love pumpkin pie and apple cider.
Me too! I also love going to football games in the fall.
That's a lot of fun! I don't know much about football, but I enjoy watching the games with my friends.
It's a great way to get together with friends and enjoy the game.
I agree! What are some of your other interests?
I love to read and write. I also like to travel and explore new places.
I love to read and write too! I'm not much of a traveler, but I enjoy learning about new cultures and places.
That's great! I think it's important to keep learning and growing.
I agree! I think it's important to challenge yourself and try new things.
I think so too! It's the only way to grow and learn.
